Add discussion fields to 23 lessons - this is essential for video-independent learning.
Expand discussion content in 43 lessons to at least 500 characters for comprehensive learning.
Add key points arrays to 71 lessons to help students identify main takeaways.
Add detailed lab instructions to 8 lab lessons for hands-on practice.
